author: USA TODAY, Cydney Henderson, USA TODAY
title: Ali Wentworth, comedian and wife of George Stephanopoulos, tests positive for COVID-19
description: The comedian and wife of ABC news anchor George Stephanopoulos confirmed her COVID-19 diagnosis, revealing that she's "never been sicker."
